<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Test a URL and retrieve associated information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/test/url"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Tests a provided URL and returns LTI assignment status, generated identifiers, and other metadata

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["url"],"properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The URL to be tested","example":"https://domain.edu/7891273"}},"title":"TestUrlRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"URL test completed successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ltiassigned":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if LTI is assigned","example":true},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Generated name identifier","example":"29167765.hugo770126995."},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Current status of the test","example":"active"},"ainame":{"type":"string","description":"AI name associated with the test","example":""},"picture":{"type":"string","description":"Picture URL or identifier","example":""},"publicId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Public identifier for the test","example":"bc6efd03-9d01-43e7-bd49-c4af1c54ae3a"}},"title":"TestUrlResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid URL format"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
